mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workspace(wkrspc_id, wrkspc_name, description, wrkspc_type, admin_user_id, update_date, update_user_id) VALUES (#{wkrspcId}, #{wrkspcName}, #{description}, #{wrkspcType}, #{adminUserId}, NOW(), #{updateUserId})
mapper.select: SELECT wkrspc_id, wrkspc_name, description, wrkspc_type, admin_user_id, update_date, update_user_id FROM workspace ORDER BY name LIMIT #{beginRowNum}, #{rowsPerPage}
